titles.title: A bill to extend of period for adjustment of status for certain Liberian nationals.
A bill to extend of period for adjustment of status for certain Liberian nationals.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary: This bill extends to June 30, 2021, the deadline for a qualifying national of Liberia to apply for permanent resident status, where currently the deadline is December 20, 2020.
